text:
Next you'll be playing a game that involves making a series of decisions on slot machines.

This portion of the experiment will take approximately 20-25 minutes to complete. If you need to take a short rest break please do so now. Otherwise, please click 'Next' to proceed.
This game will involve a series of rounds with 3 different slot machines.
On each round, you will first press the red button, which will pair you with the slot machine you are playing on that round.

After you have been paired with a slot machine on that round, you will be asked to decide how much of $1.00 you would like to bet.

Using the slider scale provided, you can decide how much of $1.00 to bet in $0.10 increments.

However, you must place a minimum bet of $0.10, so $0 is not an option.

Otherwise, feel free to bet as much or as little as you would like.
After you decide how much of the $1.00 to bet, your bet will be quadrupled (x4)!
As with most slot machines, the machine will either return none of it or will return some portion of it.

To recap, on each round of this game you will first press the red button and you will play on one of 3 different slot machines.

You will then decide how much of $1.00 you would like to bet, keeping in mind that $0 is not an option.

Whatever money you bet will then be quadrupled (x4).

The slot machine will then return nothing or give you back some portion of it.

After you place your bet, you will be notified of the outcome on that round.

You will then push the button again to play another slot machine.

At the end of the game, if this portion is selected we will randomly select two of your rounds to determine your bonus payment, so the best strategy is to try to win as much money as possible on each round.

Please review any instructions that are still unclear using the 'back' and 'forward' buttons.

If you understand the game instructions please click 'Start Game' to proceed.
